rename.from: Regression with generic type var inheritance

issue.title: Release 0.950 planning

labels.name: meta
labels.description: Issues tracking a broad area of work

issue.body:
I'm planning to make a 0.950 release by Apr 22 (tentative timeline).

Please post here any issues you'd like to see fixed in the release, or PRs you'd like to have merged.  I've already cut the release branch, but we can still cherry-pick low-risk features and bug fixes until Apr 18. After Apr 18 only critical bug fixes and documentation updates should be cherry-picked.

issue.title: Fix types of inherited attributes in generic dataclasses

body: It looks like this regression also [affects the attrs plugin](https://github.com/python-attrs/attrs/issues/960). Would it be possible to fix it for it too, please?
@hynek I'm working on it and should have a PR up soon.

issue.title: Fix forward references and generic inheritance in attrs classes
issue.body:
Move the attrs plugin to a later pass, so that we won't have placeholders. Fix
various issues related to forward references and generic inheritance, including 
some crashes.

This is follow-up to #12762 and related to #12656 and #12633.
